name: AVAssetCache
desc: An object that you use to inspect locally cached media data.

items.name: var isPlayableOffline: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the asset is playable without an internet connection.

items.name: func mediaSelectionOptions(in: AVMediaSelectionGroup) -> [AVMediaSelectionOption]
items.desc: Returns an array of locally cached media selection options that are available for offline use.
